org.jdesktop.beansbinding
Interface PropertyStateListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public interface PropertyStateListener
extends java.util.EventListener

PropertyStateListeners are registerd on Property instances, to be notified when the state of the property changes.

Method Summary
 void propertyStateChanged(PropertyStateEvent pse)
          Called to notify the listener that a change of state has occurred to one of the Property instances upon which the listener is registered.
 

Method Detail

propertyStateChanged

void propertyStateChanged(PropertyStateEvent pse)
Called to notify the listener that a change of state has occurred to one of the Property instances upon which the listener is registered.

Parameters:
pse - an event describing the state change, non-null
